sentences.en: In Southwest France in the 1940's, playing children discovered Lascaux Grotto, a series of narrow cave chambers that contain huge prehistoric paintings of animals.
sentences.cn: 20世纪40年代，在法国西南部，玩耍的孩子们发现了拉斯科洞穴，这是一系列狭窄的洞穴洞穴，里面有巨大的史前动物壁画。

sentences.en: It is said to be a grotto.
The sound of dripping water is always heard in this grotto.
sentences.cn: 这个洞穴经常能听到水滴声。
